page.title: 11ROXWELL KENNELS(CONT)
page.content: As we walked into Tony Dobson's Roxwell dog kennels we witnessed an amazing sight. There were more than 45 fairly friendly dogs, but there were a few bad tempered alsations. Their sleeping areas were 6 foot by 6 foot or 8 foot by 8 foot for the very big dogs. They also keep gerbils, budgies and terrapins. The dogs have their own wash and grooming room and hygiene and cleanliness are very important. Before you enter the kennel area you have to tread in disinfectant and all dogs have to have vaccination certificates before they are allowed on to the premises.
